meaningMnemonic: What is it called when you <kanji>calculate</kanji> <kanji>numbers</kanji>? That is the study of <vocabulary>math</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>arithmetic</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
